title._content: Mission Ridge scene of Sherman's attack.

description._content: Title: Mission Ridge scene of Sherman's attack. Creator: Barnard, George N. Date: ca. 1864-1866 Part Of: Photographic views of Sherman's campaign, from negatives taken in the field Place: Missionary Ridge, Tennessee Related Resources: digitalcollections.smu.edu/cdm/ref/collection/civ/id/435 Physical Description: 1 photographic print: albumen; 26 x 36 cm. on 41 x 51 cm. File: vault_folio_2_e470_b24_portfolio_14_sm_opt.jpg Rights: Please cite Southern Methodist University, Central University Libraries, DeGolyer Library when using this image file. A high-quality version of this file may be obtained for a fee by contacting degolyer@smu.edu. For more information, see: digitalcollections.smu.edu/cdm/ref/collection/civ/id/447 View Civil War: Photographs, Manuscripts, and Imprints digitalcollections.smu.edu/all/cul/civ/
